Name: Martial Opera
Details: Created during the golden years of the Star League by order of First Lord Jonathan Cameron, martial opera used real BattleMechs piloted by specially trained opera singers to stage performances where the massive machines became real-life characters in plays such as . The Succession Wars caused the genre to nearly disappear due to the expensive production costs, but smaller acts are still staged occasionally, although they're a pale shadow of the Star League's original shows.
